The Sujeeth Foundation

  • Let's fix the education experience. The Sujeeth Foundation provides scholarships to college students pursuing a STEM degree or graduate studies. Scholarships are awarded based on Grit scores. All applicants can take advantage of provided growth mindset training and other services.
